name: Magnet Override
description:
Magnetic Override is a game made for ScoreSpace Jam #18, It is an endless runner where you the player rides a hoverboard off into the sunset avoiding dangerous obstacles and collecting awards in your path. Don't forget to be picking up the cannisters of liquid nitrogen to keep your hoverboard cool. Swerve around the obstacles or use the magnetic pads on the ground to change the polarity of your hoverboard flipping you upsidedown onto the ceiling.

I hope you enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it.

Controls

'A & D' or 'Left & Right arrow' keys to move left or right

'Spacebar' to jump

Credits go to

Programming - Ben (Nutty Studios)

https://nutty-studios.itch.io/

Artist - Amber Kelsey

 https://www.artstation.com/aeonkitsune

Music - Various public domain tracks made prior to game jam

Uses LootLockers' leaderboard for keep highscores
